QuestData.Title: Milking Goats
QuestData.Description:
Unfortunately, Milbrooke's flock hasn't been producing lately. What with all the wolves about, the poor things must be terrified.
Wild goats wander the hills, and they are quite fearless compared to the sheep.
If you can find a few with young ones about, you may be able to persuade them to offer some fresh, delicious goat milk!
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to collect enough milk?
QuestData.RewardText: It smells wonderful. This is perfect, thank you $p!
